title: raama raama raama
sahitya:
rAma rAma rAma rAma rAma shrI rAma



caraNam 1



 rAma rAmayani vEmaru nAmadi prEmamIra ninu pilicina palukavu



caraNam 2



 talaci napuDE cAla dhanyuDanaitini pilicina palukavu pItAmbaradhara



caraNam 3



 tilakamu diddina tIraina nI mOmu kalanaina jUpavu kaustubha bhUSaNa



caraNam 4



 shankha cakra muliru vankala mereyaga ponkamutO nA vanka jUDavEmi



caraNam 5



 parama puruSa bhadragiri rAmadAsuni karuNa nElumani sharaNani vEDiti
